info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 07 at 9:18PM MDT until July 08 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM MDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL JUDITH BASIN AND SOUTH CENTRAL CHOUTEAU COUNTIES... At 918 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Highwood to 14 miles south of Fort Benton to 11 miles southwest of Geraldine to 8 miles north of Geyser, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Fort Benton, Geraldine, Highwood, Shonkin and Square Butte. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
